answers.answer: Yes it's normal just be on the look out for sudden swelling in neck & face which could signal preeclampsia.
yes, just keep an eye if you begin swelling by your face
Can be normal but your medical team should be checking your blood pressure and urine to ensure not pre-eclampsia.

question: I am 38 +2 and my.hands.and feet.are.swelling up, is this.normal?
title: swelling in my hands and feet
